attributes.action: make ALL BBC stations FREE to ALL TV License payers or abolish the License Fee altogether and let the BBC fund itself.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC uses the License Fee to make programmes and air channels. Some of the new channels can only be viewed by paying for them. The BBC has used public money to set up the channels and to make the programmes shown on them - particularly the High Definition channels.  If any BBC channel can not be viewed unless a subcription (or similar) is paid then the BBC should fund itself and the License Fee should be scrapped.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
